page.title: 13CLUBS IN BURWELL
page.content: There are many clubs in Burwell for all ages .One I go to is the{Junior {Youth Club}on Fridays from 6.00pm to 8.00pm.You need to be 11 years old to join.It is held in{The Phoenix {Room}which is the{Village College {Youth Centre.}Other{clubs for {chidren}are Guides,Scouts,Cubs,Army Cadets,Girls'and Boys' Brigades, Brownies, tennis,badminton and judo clubs. Some{clubs for adults}include gardening club,flower club and yoga. Most of these clubs are held in the Village College as part of Community Education.A lot of them are affiliated to the College Members' association. The{PHAB club}brings together Physically-Handicapped and Able- Bodied members of the community.
